div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1238 Asia Minor, northern, before 1920 (284) Burial: c. 345 B.C. Contents: 35+ AR Sinope: dr. Disposition: London Robinson, NC 1920, pp. 1-16, illus. Golenko questions the Crimean origin given by Robinson and Noe; and even Robinson, in his final sentence, infers the hd. was buried at Sinope
